summary: AN ORDINANCE providing for the acquisition by condemnation of such property rights as may be necessary for an existing Monorail system, including the terminal and escalator access thereto, in 4th Avenue North, Thomas Street, 5th Avenue North, Denny Way, 5th Avenue, Westlake Avenue and Pine Street, including the acquisition of an aerial easement at the corner of 5th Avenue North and Denny Way for said Monorail system and fire protection therefor; and providing for payment therefor.
